author: Lotte Duncan
method: Dissolve the sugar in the water and then boil for 5 minutes. Add the orange zest and juice and the cranberries and cook for 10 minutes, or until the berries are starting to burst.  Add the pears and gently cook for another 5 minutes. Cool.
ingredients: 200g/7oz light brown muscovado sugar,  300ml/10fl oz water,  1 orange, grated zest and juice  ,  225g)/8oz fresh cranberries,  2 pears, peeled, cored and diced
